treatment-md.title: Zilchistrophia hilaryae Pall-Gergely & Asami, 2014, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Description of two new Ecuadorian Zilchistrophia Weyrauch, 1960, with the clarification of the systematic position of the genus based on anatomical data (Gastropoda, Stylommatophora, Scolodontidae)
